item.title: The Nerd Knows His Red Balls
item.dc:creator: kim
item.description: One of our favorite pseudonymous bloggers, the L.A. City Nerd (c'mon, Antonio, we know it's you) has made one of the most rare of sightings, a new red 76 Ball in the wild and on the move. Visit his blog to see how carefully the balls are transported to their new homes in the sky. […]
item.content:encoded:
One of our favorite pseudonymous bloggers, the L.A. City Nerd (c'mon, Antonio, we know it's you) has made one of the most rare of sightings, a new red 76 Ball in the wild and on the move. Visit his blog to see how carefully the balls are transported to their new homes in the sky.

Where will this one end up? Could it be your local 76 station?
